title: Goldman Sachs SDE-2 vs Societe Generale SDE-2 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-3 college.
Years of Experience: 3.5+ years
Title/Level: SWE-2
Current Comp : 12 LPA (Fixed)

Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate (SDE-2)
Location: Bengaluru

Compensation:
Base Pay: INR 29,00,000
Target Bonus: INR 5,00,000
Relocation: INR 1,60,000
Total Compensation:  35.6LPA
**5 days work from office.**

Company: Societe Generale
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bengaluru

Compensation:
Salary: INR 26,00,000 (Base)
Variable Bonus: INR 4,00,000
PF, Gratuity and others: INR 2,00,000
Total Compensation:  32LPA
**2 days work from office**

Would love to know your thoughts on which company to join considering above details.
